Create table of journals surveyed

Source: R/table_of_journals.R
table_of_journals.Rd

Create table of journals surveyed

table_of_journals(rrpp)

Arguments

rrpp

`data.frame` of article evaluations

Value

pander table of journals surveyed

Examples

# \donttest{
googlesheets4::gs4_deauth()
rrpp <- googlesheets4::read_sheet(
"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19gXobV4oPZeWZiQJAPNIrmqpfGQtpapXWcSxaXRw1-M"
)

#> Reading from "article_notes"
#> Range "template"
table_of_journals(rrpp)

#> 
#> --------------------------------------
#>            Journal              Count 
#> ------------------------------ -------
#>  Australasian Plant Pathology     8   
#> 
#>   Canadian Journal of Plant      13   
#>           Pathology                   
#> 
#>        Crop Protection           14   
#> 
#>   European Journal of Plant      11   
#>           Pathology                   
#> 
#>        Forest Pathology          14   
#> 
#>    Journal of General Plant      17   
#>           Pathology                   
#> 
#>   Journal of Phytopathology      14   
#> 
#>   Journal of Plant Pathology     15   
#> 
#>   Molecular Plant Pathology      18   
#> 
#>    Molecular Plant-Microbe       16   
#>          Interactions                 
#> 
#>           Nematology             11   
#> 
#>  Physiological and Molecular     18   
#>        Plant Pathology                
#> 
#>        Phytoparasitica           19   
#> 
#>  Phytopathologia Mediterranea     9   
#> 
#>         Phytopathology           16   
#> 
#>         Plant Disease            17   
#> 
#>     Plant Health Progress        11   
#> 
#>        Plant Pathology           24   
#> 
#>      Revista Mexicana de         10   
#>         Fitopatología                 
#> 
#>    Tropical Plant Pathology       9   
#> 
#>    Virology Journal (Plant       16   
#>        Viruses Section)               
#> --------------------------------------
#> 
# }
